attributes.action: stop paying child benefit to unmarried underage, teenage parents, and restrict it to only 2 children per couple in other relationships
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Also stop giving council houses to single girls who get pregnant to gain social housing. Make them stay with their own parents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
